title: [1.7.10]适用实用MOD整合包(基础MOD+工业2+龙MOD+下界之星钻石+HerobrineMOD)
author: 结界终结者
txt_content:
本帖最后由 结界终结者 于 2015-8-14 10:53 编辑 

[适用实用MOD整合包]
这个整合包较为简易，但还是很好玩。作者还是费了一番心思。（注意，作者把小地图菜单的开关设置成了O键）———————————————————————————————————————————————————
MOD表列基础MODTMI内置合成表中文小地图R键整理中文输入补丁血量显示实用MOD更多合成更多食物工业2实验版龙MOD下界之星钻石其他MOD高清材质包HerobrineMOD


更多合成有了更多合成MOD，再也不用担心有些东西无法合成了！更多合成的部分合成表[img=250,300]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/@F70MAV8AS]4SXP_H[%7B_A1G.png[/img][img=250,300]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/%7DB[%25@(DGO3(6U%7BKK5ZR[)AR.png[/img]

更多食物更多食物MOD，吃货的选择。
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/QH)R94VLKV55LAI$JH7)IVX.png


工业时代2实验版file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/1IQ)_4PTSI%257ZLM$Y6%7BE0B7.png工业2是这里的重头戏，不管那么多了，先来几张图
[img=300,200]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/%7B54~E(8O0A]6_(9GX[L~47X.png[/img]
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/GHS1TUW4KOTK%252QXR(Y(%7DXG.png


龙MOD很酷的一个MOD：你可以孵龙蛋，还可以骑龙。[img=300,200]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/$IQ~VM5F1MIS25[AGV77N%7DE.png[/img]

下界之星钻石MODfile:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/QZXISC1691$%7B%60SIYXF7%60]E5.png将下界之星放入火炉烧炼，即可获得下界之星钻石。
下界之星钻石可以合成剑，斧，盔甲......其伤害、效率和耐久度都不比钻石的差
[img=200,300]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/D4Z1PPO4(S85DBP3E][Q8VT.png[/img]
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/QZXISC1691$%7B%60SIYXF7%60]E5.png


HerobrineMODHerobrineMOD很恐怖，胆小勿用。Herobrine的可爱的召唤台[img=300,200]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/%25RB_E2XVOAK(%25]J%255L[A[3U.png[/img]

BUG工业2：玩家无法被核弹炸死

下载地址点这里：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1gdrTSzx若无法下载，请通知作者。子曰：“评论者，真善者也。”大家评论评论吧！
